sections.text: HISTORY: Former Section, titled Short title, had the following history: 1984 Act No. 441, Section 1. Repealed by 2023 Act No. 77, Section 1, eff June 19, 2023.

HISTORY: Former Section, titled Definitions, had the following history: 1984 Act No. 441, Section 2; 1992 Act No. 330, Section 1; 2019 Act No. 61 (H.3621), Section 1, eff May 16, 2019. Repealed by 2023 Act No. 77, Section 1, eff June 19, 2023.

HISTORY: Former Section, titled Promulgation of regulations; establishment of Athletic Trainers' Advisory Committee, had the following history: 1984 Act No. 441, Section 3; 1990 Act No. 522, Section 2. Repealed by 2023 Act No. 77, Section 1, eff June 19, 2023.

HISTORY: Former Section, titled Necessity of certification; application; administrative procedures, had the following history: 1984 Act No. 441, Section 4. Repealed by 2023 Act No. 77, Section 1, eff June 19, 2023.

HISTORY: Former Section, titled Requirements for certification, had the following history: 1984 Act No. 441, Section 5; 1992 Act No. 330, Section 2; 2006 Act No. 356, Section 1, eff June 9, 2006; 2019 Act No. 61 (H.3621), Section 2, eff May 16, 2019. Repealed by 2023 Act No. 77, Section 1, eff June 19, 2023.
HISTORY: Former Section, titled Reciprocity with other states, had the following history: 1984 Act No. 441, Section 6. Repealed by 2023 Act No. 77, Section 1, eff June 19, 2023.
HISTORY: Former Section, titled Fees, had the following history: 1984 Act No. 441, Section 7. Repealed by 2023 Act No. 77, Section 1, eff June 19, 2023.
HISTORY: Former Section, titled Exemption from certification, had the following history: 1984 Act No. 441, Section 8. Repealed by 2023 Act No. 77, Section 1, eff June 19, 2023.
HISTORY: Former Section, titled Grandfather provision, had the following history: 1984 Act No. 441, Section 9. Repealed by 2023 Act No. 77, Section 1, eff June 19, 2023.

HISTORY: Former Section, titled Applicability to employee of athletic organization, had the following history: 1984 Act No. 441, Section 10; 1992 Act No. 330, Section 3; 2019 Act No. 61 (H.3621), Section 3, eff May 16, 2019. Repealed by 2023 Act No. 77, Section 1, eff June 19, 2023.

HISTORY: Former Section, titled Hiring of certified athletic trainers by school districts, had the following history: 1984 Act No. 441, Section 11. Repealed by 2023 Act No. 77, Section 1, eff June 19, 2023.

HISTORY: Former Section, titled Penalties, had the following history: 1984 Act No. 441 Section 12; 2019 Act No. 61 (H.3621), Section 4, eff May 16, 2019. Repealed by 2023 Act No. 77, Section 1, eff June 19, 2023.
